uvi.description:
drm: Lock pointer access in drm_master_release()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.195 by commit a376f7e66b654cb290fa9d16d8dab5bfef744463. For more details please see the references link.
